data.title: Movies on the Lied Super Screen in Hastings Nebraska
data.meta_description: See the latest films on the Giant Screen, 3 stories tall! Our theater can seat up to 211 people and shows Hollywood movies as well as large format educational films. Perfect for kids and families.
data.text:
For the best edutainment-style films and recent hit movies, Hastings Museum is your spot for enlightening entertainment! The digital projector with 4K capabilities and 65 foot wide screen were installed in 2011 and are sure to amaze. Images are crisp, bright – and big! Especially exciting is the 3D technology that comes with RealD 3D technology. Films and movies presented in RealD 3D immerse you in exciting new worlds, it’s like you’ve stepped into the movie. You won’t just watch the movie – you’ll experience it!

Add in the six channel digital surround sound and some great movie munchies, and Hastings Museum is the best (and biggest!) Theatre in the region!

The Theatre is entirely wheelchair and handicapped accessible.
